title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw
name: neotw
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/button/repo":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/button/repo","caption":"Repo button","description":"repo button","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","text":"\whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://gitlab.com/ \define target() oeyoews/neotw <$button tooltip="" aria-label="" class=<>> addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon/gitlab}} "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon/gitlab":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon/gitlab","tags":"$:/tags/Image","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/icon","text":"{{$:/favicon.ico}} "},"Index":{"title":"Index","text":"
Hello, on <>
{{neotw/image/showcase-01.png}} {{neotw/badges}} <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> {{$:/state/git/commit}} "},"neotw/library":{"title":"neotw/library","description":"neotw library","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Neotw Plugin Library","url":"https://neotw.netlify.app/library/index.html","text":"Neotw Plugin Library "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/macros":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define neotw-username(username:"oeyoews") $username$ \end \define neotw-align(align:"center", tiddler)
{{$tiddler$}}
\end \define details(text:"", summary:"details" open:"")
$summary$ $text$
\end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/pluginlist":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/pluginlist","text":"<$vars qualified-state=<> pluginFilter="[plugin-type[plugin]prefix[$:/plugins/oeyoews/]] +[!has[draft.of]sort[]search:-text,*]" > <$list filter=<> emptyMessage=<> template="$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme","text":"* neotw builtin plugin "},"$:/config/AnimationDuration":{"title":"$:/config/AnimationDuration","text":"350 "},"$:/config/NewJournal/Title":{"title":"$:/config/NewJournal/Title","text":"YYYY/0MM/0DD "},"$:/DefaultTiddlers":{"title":"$:/DefaultTiddlers","text":"Index [list[$:/StoryList]] "},"$:/SiteTitle":{"title":"$:/SiteTitle","text":"{{flask-22-icon}} Neotw ðŸŽ‰ "},"$:/SiteSubtitle":{"title":"$:/SiteSubtitle","text":"<> "},"neotw/copy-text":{"title":"neotw/copy-text","caption":"copy code","description":"copy text","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!text}} tooltip="copy current code" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{neotw/svg/vscode}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "},"neotw/viewbar/copy-title":{"title":"neotw/viewbar/copy-title","caption":"Copy Tiddler Title","description":"Copy the name of this tiddler to the clipboard","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!title}} tooltip="copy current title" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "}}}
